CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Copilot in Meetings will suggest follow up questions to ask it
CurrentVersion.description: When Copilot in Teams Meetings responds to a prompt, it will also suggest follow up prompts to ask Copilot that build on the prior response. These questions will generally be based on the response it gave prior, and could be related to honing in on a particular topic, asking for more details, or even reformatting the content into a table if appropriate.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Copilot in Meetings will suggest follow up questions to ask it
OldVersion.description: When Copilot in Teams Meetings responds to a prompt, it will also suggest follow ups to keep the conversation going. These questions will generally be based on the response it gave prior, and could be related to honing in on a particular topic, asking for more details, or asking what a particular person said during the meeting.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Copilot in Teams can analyze content shared on-screen during a meeting
CurrentVersion.description: Now, Copilot in Teams can analyze content shared on-screen during a meeting when recording is enabled. This, along with meeting transcript and meeting chat, enables users to ask Copilot to summarize or find specific information from screen-shared content (e.g., ‘Which products had the highest sales?’), consolidate insights across both the conversation and presentation (e.g., 'What was the feedback per slide?'), and draft new content based on the entire meeting (e.g., 'Rewrite the paragraph shared on the screen incorporating the feedback from the chat’). This works for any content shared while sharing your desktop screen (including but not limited to documents, slides, spreadsheets, and websites, irrespective of platform or app). Support for PowerPoint Live and Whiteboard in Teams will be available at a later date.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Copilot in Teams can analyze content shared on-screen during a meeting
OldVersion.description: Now, Copilot in Teams can analyze content shared on-screen during a meeting when recording is enabled. This, along with meeting transcript and meeting chat, enables users to ask Copilot to summarize or find specific information from screen-shared content (e.g., ‘Which products had the highest sales?’), consolidate insights across both the conversation and presentation (e.g., 'What was the feedback per slide?'), and draft new content based on the entire meeting (e.g., 'Rewrite the paragraph shared on the screen incorporating the feedback from the chat’). This works for any content shared while sharing your desktop screen (including but not limited to documents, slides, spreadsheets, and websites, irrespective of platform or app). Support for PowerPoint Live and Whiteboard in Teams will be available at a later date.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Message/Attachment contains EXO predicates
CurrentVersion.description: Introducing two new DLP Exchange predicates: "Message contains" and "Attachment contains" with a focus on DLP evaluation on specific email components like email body or attachments only. Unlike the broader "Content contains" predicate that evaluated entire email envelope, these enable targeted DLP evaluation on specific email components only.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Message/Attachment contains EXO predicates
OldVersion.description: Introducing two new DLP Exchange predicates: "Message contains" and "Attachment contains" with a focus on DLP evaluation on specific email components like email body or attachments only. Unlike the broader "Content contains" predicate that evaluated entire email envelope, these enable targeted DLP evaluation on specific email components only.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Custom background for Teams Rooms on Android
CurrentVersion.description: IT admins can upload custom background images on the Teams admin center to reinforce their company brand on their Teams Rooms devices. The main room display, extended room display, and touch console can each have its own specific background image. PNG, JPG, and JPEG, formats are supported. This feature is only available with the Teams Rooms Pro license.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Custom background for Teams Rooms on Android
OldVersion.description: IT admins can upload custom background images on the Teams admin center to reinforce their company brand on their Teams Rooms devices. The main room display, extended room display, and touch console can each have its own specific background image. PNG, JPG, and JPEG, formats are supported. This feature is only available with the Teams Rooms Pro license.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Add Shared Folders to Favorites in the new Outlook for Windows and web
CurrentVersion.description: Customers will have the ability to add shared folders to their favorites. This enhancement offers users increased flexibility and convenience, allowing easy and quick access to important shared content directly from their Favorites list. #newoutlookforwindows

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Add Shared Folders to Favorites in the new Outlook for Windows and web
OldVersion.description: Customers will have the ability to add shared folders to their favorites. This enhancement offers users increased flexibility and convenience, allowing easy and quick access to important shared content directly from their Favorites list. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: People Hub improvements in new Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: In new Outlook for Windows, the People Hub offers a streamlined contacts interface with a single view of each person, automatically linking duplicates and enriching them with organizational profiles. #newoutlookforwindows

OldVersion.title: Outlook: People Hub improvements in new Outlook for Windows
OldVersion.description: In new Outlook for Windows, the People Hub offers a streamlined contacts interface with a single view of each person, automatically linking duplicates and enriching them with organizational profiles. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Copilot Dashboard - Non-Copilot cohort and exclusion list using AAD Groups (Entra ID)
CurrentVersion.description: For the Copilot dashboard, the non-Copilot user cohort list and exclusion list can be managed by Global Administrators using AAD (Azure Active Directory) Groups.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Copilot Dashboard - Non-Copilot cohort and exclusion list using AAD Groups (Entra ID)
OldVersion.description: For the Copilot dashboard, the non-Copilot user cohort list and exclusion list can be managed by Global Administrators using AAD (Azure Active Directory) Groups.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Oversharing Pop-up enhancements on Outlook win32 desktop
CurrentVersion.description: We are expanding the functionality of oversharing pop-ups (Show policy tip as a dialog) in outlook win32 to support additional scenarios powered with predicates such as Content is not labeled and Message/Attachment is not labeled, File extension is. It will also support a customizable oversharing dialog with the ability to configure custom title, body, business justifications, and dynamic variables/tokens for matched recipients, attachment names, and labels.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Oversharing Pop-up enhancements on Outlook win32 desktop
OldVersion.description: We are expanding the functionality of oversharing pop-ups (Show policy tip as a dialog) in outlook win32 to support additional scenarios powered with predicates such as Content is not labeled and Message/Attachment is not labeled, File extension is. It will also support a customizable oversharing dialog with the ability to configure custom title, body, business justifications, and dynamic variables/tokens for matched recipients, attachment names, and labels.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Automatically display auto-mapped calendars
CurrentVersion.description: Users will be able to automatically see their auto-mapped calendars when toggling from classic Outlook to the new. #newoutlookforwindows

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Automatically display auto-mapped calendars
OldVersion.description: Users will be able to automatically see their auto-mapped calendars when toggling from classic Outlook to the new. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Email verification for external attendees to join Teams meetings
CurrentVersion.description: Meeting organizers can have greater confidence about external attendees joining Teams meetings, this capability enables sending a one-time passcode to the external attendee’s email address for that individual to use during a verification step when joining a Teams meeting.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Email verification for external attendees to join Teams meetings
OldVersion.description: Meeting organizers can have greater confidence about external attendees joining Teams meetings, this capability enables sending a one-time passcode to the external attendee’s email address for that individual to use during a verification step when joining a Teams meeting.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Amplify - Support for dwell time graph in Amplify reporting
CurrentVersion.description: This release will add a dwell time graph to Amplify reporting. The dwell time graph will indicate the average time users spend reading a publication, giving important insight into the engagement of users with the Amplify campaign. This graph will be supported from SharePoint and Outlook channels.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Amplify - Support for dwell time and clicks graphs in Amplify reporting
OldVersion.description: This release will add two new graphs to Amplify reporting: dwell time and clicks. The dwell time graph will indicate the average time users spend reading a publication, giving important insight into the engagement of users with the Amplify campaign. The clicks graph will indicate the number of times a link in the publication was clicked by a reader, again giving important insight into the engagement level of users. Both of these metrics will be supported from SharePoint and Outlook channels.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Updated Context IQ menu in Business Chat
CurrentVersion.description: Updates to Copilot Context IQ menu provides an intuitive and seamless interaction improving reliability and performance.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Updated Context IQ menu in Business Chat
OldVersion.description: Updates to Copilot Context IQ menu provides an intuitive and seamless interaction improving reliability and performance.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance - Detect workplace safety concerns in user-reported Teams messages
CurrentVersion.description:
Communication Compliance introduces the ability to identify and flag potential workplace safety concerns in user-reported Teams messages. Investigators now have an extra indication to decide what risk exists in user-reported messages and can configure an Inappropriate Content policy to proactively identify similar inappropriate content moving forward.

Microsoft Purview Communication Compliance provides the tools to help organizations detect regulatory compliance violations (e.g. SEC or FINRA), such as sensitive or confidential information, harassing or threatening language, and sharing of adult content. Built with privacy by design, usernames are pseudonymized by default, role-based access controls are built in, investigators are opted in by an admin, and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance - Detect workplace safety concerns in user-reported Teams messages
OldVersion.description:
Communication Compliance introduces the ability to identify and flag potential workplace safety concerns in user-reported Teams messages. Investigators now have an extra indication to decide what risk exists in user-reported messages and can configure an Inappropriate Content policy to proactively identify similar inappropriate content moving forward.

Microsoft Purview Communication Compliance provides the tools to help organizations detect regulatory compliance violations (e.g. SEC or FINRA), such as sensitive or confidential information, harassing or threatening language, and sharing of adult content. Built with privacy by design, usernames are pseudonymized by default, role-based access controls are built in, investigators are opted in by an admin, and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 app: Microsoft Places - Workplace check-in with Workplace Presence
CurrentVersion.description: With Workplace Presence, employees will have the ability to check in to the office in Outlook, Teams, and Places to confirm their work plans, receive check-in reminders, and view others nearby and who planned to come in. #newoutlookforwindows

OldVersion.title: Microsoft 365 app: Microsoft Places - Workplace check-in with Workplace Presence
OldVersion.description: With Workplace Presence, employees will have the ability to check in to the office in Outlook, Teams, and Places to confirm their work plans, receive check-in reminders, and view others nearby and who planned to come in. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Planner: Unified Planner tab experience in Microsoft Teams
CurrentVersion.description: With this unified tab experience, you can now create and add any basic or premium plan to a Planner tab in Microsoft Teams. To try it, go to any Teams channel and search for Planner after selecting the Apps icon.

OldVersion.title: Planner: Unified Planner tab experience in Microsoft Teams
OldVersion.description: With this unified tab experience, you can now create and add any basic or premium plan to a Planner tab in Microsoft Teams. To try it, go to any Teams channel and search for Planner after selecting the Apps icon.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Customize the location of Teams notifications
CurrentVersion.description: You can now customize where your Teams notification appear on your screen. Options include bottom right, top right, bottom left, and top left, allowing you to choose the most convenient and least intrusive location for a better experience and productivity.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Customize the location of Teams notifications
OldVersion.description: You can now customize where your Teams notification appear on your screen. Options include bottom right, top right, bottom left, and top left, allowing you to choose the most convenient and least intrusive location for a better experience and productivity.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Keyword monitoring email notification enhancements
CurrentVersion.description: This revamps the existing content alert (keyword monitoring) emails that admins receive to include added context on the content being monitored and minor security enhancements.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Keyword monitoring email notification enhancements
OldVersion.description: This revamps the existing content alert (keyword monitoring) emails that admins receive to include added context on the content being monitored and minor security enhancements.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Minimize the compose window to multitask in the Outlook app for iOS and Android
CurrentVersion.description: Outlook will help you compose emails more quickly and efficiently by allowing you to minimize your draft emails and quickly access them again from the message list or calendar view. This means that, while composing an email, you can easily get information you need from your calendar or other emails and easily get back into the draft you are working on without ever having to go to the Draft folder.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Minimize the compose window to multitask in the Outlook app for iOS and Android
OldVersion.description: Outlook will help you compose emails more quickly and efficiently by allowing you to minimize your draft emails and quickly access them again from the message list or calendar view. This means that, while composing an email, you can easily get information you need from your calendar or other emails and easily get back into the draft you are working on without ever having to go to the Draft folder.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot extensibility – Developers can create, test and update custom engine agents to run in Microsoft 365 Copilot and Teams
CurrentVersion.description: Developers can create, test and update custom engine agents using Teams Toolkit & Microsoft Copilot Studio, so that they can run in Microsoft 365 Copilot and Teams.

CurrentVersion.title: Planner: Status report emails with Project Manager Agent
CurrentVersion.description: A new feature in the Project Manager Agent automates the creation of status report emails for your plans. This capability streamlines project updates by generating concise, accurate, and professional email summaries based on your plan's progress, key milestones, and upcoming tasks. With this feature, you can ensure stakeholders stay informed effortlessly, saving time while maintaining transparency and alignment across your projects.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Graph: Graph API - New Outlook for Windows usage
CurrentVersion.description: New Outlook for Windows usage will be added to the Microsoft Graph API, allowing organizations to monitor the adoption and usage of the new Outlook for Windows client within their organization. This will facilitate the creation of customized reports and analytics. Metrics included in the Graph API will match those available in new Outlook for Windows usage of Microsoft 365 apps usage report in the Microsoft 365 admin center, including tenant-level count of active users who have transitioned from Outlook for Windows (classic) to the new Outlook for Windows, as well as flags indicating usage of the new or classic Outlook per user over the specified time period.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Summarize email attachments with Copilot
CurrentVersion.description: You will now be able to summarize PDF, Word, and PowerPoint email attachments with Copilot in Outlook on the web and new Outlook for Windows. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Department graph for Microsoft Purview Data Security Posture Management for AI
CurrentVersion.description: A new graph added to Microsoft Purview Data Security Posture Management for AI displays the departments of users interacting with M365 Copilot.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Quick sharing of files in Teams
CurrentVersion.description: Share a file from a chat conversation, Shared tab or a channel post to 1:1 chats, group chats, or channels with fewer clicks. When files are shared, their permissions are maintained, ensuring that recipients have the appropriate access rights. You can add additional information to your message and @mention recipients for greater clarity and alignment.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Quick sharing of files in Teams
OldVersion.description: Share a file from a chat conversation, Shared tab or a channel post to 1:1 chats, group chats, or channels with fewer clicks. When files are shared, their permissions are maintained, ensuring that recipients have the appropriate access rights. You can add additional information to your message and @mention recipients for greater clarity and alignment.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Share user risk details with other security solutions [Government customers only]
CurrentVersion.description:
Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management is introducing sharing Insider Risk Management data with other Microsoft services for Government customers. When turned on, admins with the correct permissions will be able to review user risk details and alerts from Insider Risk Management within other solutions such as Data Loss Prevention (DLP), Communication Compliance, and Microsoft Defender.

Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Ability for all participants to start collaborative annotations
CurrentVersion.description: All participants in meetings are now able to start collaborative annotations. This will only be available in the new Microsoft Teams experience.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Ability for all participants to start collaborative annotations
OldVersion.description: All participants in meetings are now able to start collaborative annotations. This will only be available in the new Microsoft Teams experience.
